comment.author: 33577523@N08
comment._content: This was more then likely number 9 Henrietta Street, Waterford which was the address of the David Beatty Sailors Rest. There is a nice photo of the building exterior in the NLI catalogue here P_WP_4498 A little more on David Beatty here en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Beatty,_1st_Earl_Beatty
